text: la ahd 'ahsan dynana miman ainqad bqlbh wsayr jwarhh lilah taealaa whdh, wahu mhsn, watabae din 'iibrahim wshreh, mayla ean aleaqayid alfasdt walshraye albatl. waqad 'astafaa allah 'iibrahim -elyh alsalat walslam- watkhdhh sfyaan min bayn sayr khlqh. wafi hadhih alayt, 'iithbat sifat alkhullt lilah -teala- wahi 'aelaa mqamat almhbt, walastfa'
